channel.title: CVE Feed for NETGEAR -- Orbi
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NETGEAR -- Orbi

item.title: CVE-2020-27861|2024-08-04T16:25:43.503Z -- netgear -- orbi
item.description: This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of NETGEAR Orbi 2.5.1.16 routers. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability. The specific flaw exists within the UA_Parser utility. A crafted Host Name option in a DHCP request can trigger execution of a system call composed from a user-supplied string. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of root. Was ZDI-CAN-11076.
